sliderAbout.title: What is the function of Ghoroya.com?
sliderAbout.description: Ghoroya.com New and Small Entrepreneurs from all over Bangladesh offers a wide variety of home made food such as breakfast, lunch, evening snacks, dinner, bread, cake, pitha, pudding, biryani and various home cooking masalas etc. Besides, various types of hand-made products such as jute products, woven products, khadi products, nakshi kantha, shataranji, craft products, cane products, kushi products, leather products, bamboo furniture, boutiques, boutique sewing products, handpaint, wallpaint etc. directly to the consumer. Selling and working with easy and short time delivery facility.
